attributes.action: fully subsidise, from public funds, the annual fees payable to the NMC by qualified nurses and midwives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should recognise the contribution made by nurses and midwives by granting an annual allowance to cover the costs of membership of the Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC). These fees are currently mandatory, and nurses must appear on the NMC register in order to practice.
